comment: A subset of generators is contained in a submonoid iff the set of words on the generators is in the submonoid. This can be viewed as an elementary way of saying "the monoidal closure of ` J ` is ` Word J ` ". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
